movies.title: Stagknight
movies.plot: Stagknight is derived from the uncensored lusty straight-to-Drive-In horrors of the 70's and 80's, I Spit on your Grave, The Beast, Samurai Assisan, movies that spawned the mighty Evil Dead, American Werewolf in London, later Aliens. Set deep in dark mythical English woods Stagknight presents a uniquely stupid look at this genre through the cracked "Weekend Warriors" paintball team. This is mansville not boytown on a blow-out bachelor paintball weekender bender of dirty tricks, hot babes and truly splatter-tastic medieval kills to die for.
movies.simplePlot: Stagknight is derived from the uncensored lusty straight-to-Drive-In horrors of the 70's and 80's, I Spit on your Grave, The Beast, Samurai Assisan, movies that spawned the mighty Evil Dead...

biography.bio: Martin Bayfield was born on December 21, 1966 in Bedford, Bedfordshire, England as Martin Christopher Bayfield. He is known for his work on Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (2002), Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (2001) and Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 (2011).
biography.name: Martin Bayfield

biography.bio: Jocelyn Osorio was born in Iquique, Chile, to Abraham a jewelry maker and Maria Eugenia, a hair stylist. Jocelyn is of German and Spanish descent. At age 16, she won a national beauty competition which led her to her first TV appearances. She then decided to follow her love of acting at age 18 and turned down a request to represent Chile in the Miss World Pageant in order to take up an opportunity to study drama in London UK at 'Italia Conti' drama school . In England she was cast in her first lead movie role "Stagknight" a comedy flick feature directed by Australian director Simon Cathcart. Jocelyn was soon acting next to young upcoming British talent like Michelle Ryans (Bionic Woman) and Jamal K Malik (Slumdog Millionaire) while also being the face for Herbal Essence worldwide. She then decided to move to the United States to further pursue her acting career. Jocelyn was cast in the feature film "Disrupt/Dismantle" which won several awards, later appeared in the acclaimed FOX TV show "Sons of Anarchy". Jocelyn has modelled and represented worldwide brands such as Calvin Klein, JCPenny, Herbal Essence, Theo Fennell diamonds, Hyundai, Lexus, Rock & Republic, and Armani, Disaronno. She is also actively involved in the non-profit organization Kiva.
biography.name: Jocelyn Osorio

biography.bio: Paul Coskun is an actor and producer, known for Stagknight (2007) and Herman: The Man Behind the Terror.
biography.name: Paul Coskun

biography.bio: Simeon Willis is an actor and assistant director, known for Narcopolis (2015), Hetty Feather (2015) and Mr Selfridge (2013).
biography.name: Simeon Willis

biography.bio: James is a British actor with a wide ranging theatre and screen career. Born in Kent to Anthony and Susan Hillier he is the eldest of three boys. He studied English Literature at King's College, London and then went on to train at RADA from where he went straight into the prestigious BBC production of Great Expectation. His stage work includes 'Lulu' at the Almeida, 'The Homecoming' at The Royal Exchange, the British Premier of Tennessee Williams, 'Something Cloudy Something Clear' and 'Blue Surge' by Rebecca Gilman for which he was nominated for a Best Male Performer Award. James is artistic director of theatre company Defibrillator. He spends his spare time with his long time partner Amy Lamont and their two boys and is a talented sportsman and sports fan, following Tottenham Hotspur FC.
biography.name: James Hillier

biography.bio: Jason Lee Hyde is an actor and producer, known for Hit the Big Time (2009), The Green Rush (2017) and Stagknight (2007).
biography.name: Jason Lee Hyde

biography.bio: Harry Athwal is an actor, known for Stagknight (2007).
biography.name: Harry Athwal

biography.bio: Sandra Dickinson was born on October 20, 1948 in Washington, District of Columbia, USA. She is known for her work on Teletubbies (1997), Balto (1995) and Superman III (1983). She has been married to Mark Osmond since August 16, 2009. She was previously married to Peter Davison and Hugh Dickinson.
biography.name: Sandra Dickinson

biography.bio: Danielle Mason was born in 1983 in London, England as Danielle Carly Mason. She is an actress, known for Filthy Rich and Famous (2008), Stagknight (2007) and Looser Women Live (2012).
biography.name: Danielle Mason

biography.name: Stephen Wisdom

biography.name: Tony Tang

biography.name: Joe Montana

biography.name: Santos Regules

biography.bio: Simon Cathcart is a director and actor, known for Stagknight (2007) and Black Velvet (2002).
biography.name: Simon Cathcart

biography.bio: Barry McNeill is an actor, known for Stagknight (2007) and Great Performances (1971).
